name: Shimmer Of Light
description:
In a Shimmer of Light you play as a character named Photon, who has one very special ability: he can change the time of day in an instant. The time of day influences the world around you significantly. This makes for some quick reaction time platforming with a high skill ceiling. Aswell as some puzzles to solve along the way.

Your ultimate goal is to find out your purpose in an abandoned temple, but the way there is rough. Having to climb mountains and tunnel trough dangerous mines.

Best played with a controller! This is the demo version of the game, which is unfinished. But when I have the time I will probably finish this! Playtrough:
